title: [LFT] Silver III | Victoria | :)

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
My name is Dylan | Kaliber | Age: 16 and 6 months
I'm currently looking for a team, 
I play many positions, and extremely strong in every single role, expect jungle, since the changes have caused me to have difficulties
I am extremely good at both adc and mid lane, My style is aggressive or when I feel like it's needed farm lane, 
Mid lane, I'm decent, I have a huge champion pool compared to most people, I know how much aggregation I need to be able to get a kill after level 6.

I can play top and Support at a professional level, but rule 1, for me I am only as good as my adc

Thanks,
Kaliber

> 
> **~~I can play top and Support at a professional level~~**, but rule 1, for me I am only as good as my adc

You are silver 3...

> > I'm currently looking for a team,

> > I am extremely good at both adc and mid lane, My style is aggressive or when I feel like it's needed farm lane,

> You are silver 3...

It's a rank, Doesn't mean I am in silver, I successiful ran a team and won 4/5 promos, with only set back was 1 game where I personally throw mate (this was over a year ago when I was bronze tyvm)

> what rank are you?

Silver III ....
Yeah you're basically professional... Can definitely play those roles at a professional level. Teams keeping you in silver I bet. You're much better than every other silver player out there.

> Yeah you're basically professional... Can definitely play those roles at a professional level. Teams keeping you in silver I bet. You're much better than every other silver player out there.

not only that, but he says he is silver from teams, when he was in bronze he went 4-1 in teams and got silver....

even challengers in OCE dont play at a professional level....aint no one in OCE getting exclusively PAID to play LOL.
